Pre-Game Insights: Colombia will face Lionel Messi and Argentina, who will defend their championship title, on Sunday at the Hard Rock Stadium.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled for 8 p.m. on July 14th.
Shakira will perform at the Copa América closing ceremony.
The official song for this year’s tournament is Shakira’s song “Puntería”.
Tickets for the match are available for purchase on Ticketmaster, with prices starting at $1,500 and going as high as $9,000.
Others: Aventura Brightline will be offering complimentary shuttles to take you directly to the stadium.
The tournament will be broadcast on FOX Networks, Univision, and TUDN with Spanish commentary.
You can stream the tournament via Sling TV’s Blue Plan or Fubo.
